references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3d objects
references.reason: This paper introduces Objaverse, a large-scale dataset of 3D objects used for training and evaluating the MIDI model, significantly impacting its performance and generalization ability.
This foundational paper introduces denoising diffusion models, the core technology underlying the MIDI model's multi-instance diffusion approach.

references.paper_title: Flow straight and fast: Learning to generate and transfer data with rectified flow
references.reason: This paper introduces the rectified flow architecture, a crucial component of the 3D object generation models utilized by MIDI, enhancing its efficiency and stability.

references.paper_title: Craftsman: High-fidelity mesh generation with 3d native generation and interactive geometry refiner
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art 3D object generation model that serves as the foundation for the MIDI model, significantly contributing to its accuracy and quality of generated 3D objects.

references.paper_title: 3D-Front: 3D furnished rooms with layouts and semantics
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3D-Front dataset, a key dataset used for training the MIDI model.  The dataset's quality and characteristics are crucial to MIDI's performance on synthetic data.
